Instance: The Treasure of Rohan
You have defended the herd from the attacking Orcs
<rgb=#FF0000>A black horse has been stolen</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>A black horse has been stolen</rgb>
Defend the herd from attacking Orcs.
<rgb=#FF0000>Skessa, leader of Mordor's hunters, has arrived</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>A black horse has been stolen</rgb>
Shadowfax is at the centre of the wild herd.\n\nYou should confront Shadowfax.
<rgb=#00FF00>Shadowfax, Arod, and Hasufel have arrived to aid you</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>A black horse has been stolen</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Shadowfax has been defeated</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Arod has been defeated</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Thieves and hunters are approaching from the north-west...protect the horses!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Hasufel has been defeated</rgb>
<rgb=#FF00FF>This instance is meant to be run with Mounted Combat. It may be run on foot, but will be considerably harder.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Skessa has been defeated, but the raid continues!</rgb>
Defend the herd from attacking Orcs
Confront Shadowfax
<rgb=#FF0000>At least one black horse must remain</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Shadowfax must survive</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Arod must survive</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Hasufel must survive</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Thieves and hunters are attacking from the north-east...protect the horses!</rgb>
'Come on, you mangy beast!'
You have journeyed to the horse-herd the mysterious old man directed you.
<rgb=#FF0000>Thieves and hunters are approaching from the south-west...protect the horses!</rgb>
The Lord of the Mearas whinnies and shakes his mane as you approach. When he calms, he looks upon you with regal approval.
<rgb=#FF0000>Thieves and hunters are approaching from the south-east...protect the horses!</rgb>
